name: Portal Pursuit
description:
PORTAL PURSUIT

Premise:

You're on the hunt for an interdimensional criminal. There have been reports that he's been hopping through different worlds planting bombs and causing mischief. He's almost in your grasp, he can't run away forever. But wait a minute, why does he look like you?

Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

ARROW KEYS to use weapon

[E] to defuse bombs

SHIFT to change weapons

Credits:

Austin Kind - Programming

Kahlen Friske - Programming

Keyton Friske - Art

This game was made for the DevSquad Academy Jam.
